channel.title: [PI] How do I make an area multi-combat?
channel.description:
I have godwars on my server. The one thing several users have complained about though is that some of the areas aren't multi-comat, which makes it extremely difficult to win, unless you have a team, in which at least four people are there keeping the other NPC's from attacking you, that way you can actually attack the boss. How do I make an area multi-combat? I'd really appreciate any help.
Edit: Since I haven't received a response yet, I did some searching and found a potential solution in NPC.java.
I added the coords of the areas I wanted to make multi, and restarted the server, but it still didn't work.
Please help!
